> [[ Conversation Topic (Set by Aelriss): Inner Sanctum Expedition ]]
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: So, this is gonna sound stupid.
> [[ Dorian ]]: Then we'll know it's really you.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: We can all see Kjorikos, correct?
> [[ Kainzo ]]: I believe we know where he is. If anyone doesn't, they could follow someone else.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Alright.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: I'm suggesting an all-out ambush.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Kainzo, on your signal, everyone fast or ranged can go in and do as much damage as possible.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: AS loudly as possible.
> [[ Ayla ]]: I can do that.
> [[ Andor ]]: Same.
> [[ Aelriss ]]: And if that golem goes after you, it's got a weak point inside its upper chest. Outmaneuver it if you can.

It's only then you start to hear it: the repeated sounding of a distant, familiar 'ping'. There's a light from far across the clearing, and your vision snaps over to see Tatsumaki, fully illuminated, curled up in the nook of a tree, fumbling with her UI.

The Artificer hears it as well.

> [[ Nel ]]: uh I think someone still has their notifications on
> [[ Ayla ]]: Welp.
> [[ Vyx ]]: Fuck.
> [[ Donnel changed the conversation topic to: JUST ]]

> [[ Continued ]]
